findings.title: Possible Sandwich/MEV For Maximum PlatformTokenDivs
findings.description: The `_claimPlatformTokenDivs()` function is vulnerable to possible sandwich attacks due to unrestricted `getAmountsOut()` calculation, resulting in a smaller gain for this round of yielding.

findings.title: Nonfunctional Slippage Control
findings.description: The Vault::handleFee() routine attempts to limit possible slippage by computing minimum amount after conversion in amountOutMin, but does not effectively mitigate front-running attacks.

findings.title: Simplified noContractsAllowed() Implementation
findings.description: The modifier `noContractsAllowed()` has redundant computation and can be simplified to remove unnecessary checks.
